languages.text: {n}Гемункулы молчат... а затем начинают хихикать. Мерзкий звук заставляет вашу кожу подернуться дрожью.{/n} "Это пугает, да? Мысль о том, что ты — не единственн{mf|ый|ая} мон-кай, служащ{mf|ий|ая} мне? Теряйся в догадках, образец. Теряйся в догадках".

traits.locale_text: {n}Гемункулы молчат... а затем начинают хихикать. Мерзкий звук заставляет вашу кожу подернуться дрожью.{/n} "Это пугает, да? Мысль о том, что ты — не единственн{mf|ый|ая} мон-кай, служащая мне? Теряйся в догадках, образец. Теряйся в догадках".
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone

languages.text: {n}The Haemonculi are quiet, and then... they start to giggle. The revolting sound makes your skin crawl.{/n} "Scary, isn't it? The thought that you're not the only mon-keigh who serves me. Try and guess, specimen. Try and guess."
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункулы молчат... а затем начинают хихикать. Мерзкий звук заставляет вашу кожу подернуться дрожью.{/n} "Это пугает, да? Мысль о том, что ты — не единственн{mf|ый|ая} мон-кай, служащ{mf|ий|ая} мне? Теряйся в догадках, образец. Теряйся в догадках".

traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone

languages.text: {n}所有的血伶人安静下来，之后……开始齐声大笑起来。他那令人作呕的声音让你浑身起满了鸡皮疙瘩。{/n}“你怕了，对不对？因为你意识到，服侍我的猴子不只有你一个。猜猜看吧，实验样本，猜猜看。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi are quiet, and then... they start to giggle. The revolting sound makes your skin crawl.{/n} "Scary, isn't it? The thought that you're not the only mon-keigh who serves me. Try and guess, specimen. Try and guess."

traits.locale_text: {n}所有的血伶人安静下来，之后……一起笑了起来，他那令人作呕的声音让你浑身起满了鸡皮疙瘩。{/n}“你怕了，对不对？因为你意识到，服侍我的猴子不只有你一个。猜猜看吧，实验样本，猜猜看。”
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone

languages.text: {n}Die Haemonculi sind still, dann ... beginnen sie zu kichern. Das abstoßende Geräusch jagt dir einen Schauer den Rücken hinunter.{/n} "Gruselig, nicht wahr? Der Gedanke, dass Ihr nicht der einzige Chem-Pan-Sey seid, der mir dient. Ratet doch einmal, Versuchsstück. Ratet."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi are quiet, and then... they start to giggle. The revolting sound makes your skin crawl.{/n} "Scary, isn't it? The thought that you're not the only mon-keigh who serves me. Try and guess, specimen. Try and guess."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Haemonculi sind still, dann ... kichern sie. Das abstoßende Geräusch jagt dir einen Schauer den Rücken hinunter.{/n} "Gruselig, nicht wahr? Der Gedanke, dass Ihr nicht der einzige Chem-Pan-Sey seid, der mir dient. Ratet doch einmal, Versuchsstück. Ratet."
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone

languages.text: {n}Los hemónculos se quedan callados, y entonces... se echan a reír. Es un sonido repulsivo que te pone la carne de gallina.{/n} «Da miedo, ¿verdad? La idea de que no seas {mf|el único|la única} mon-keigh a mi servicio. A ver si lo adivinas, espécimen. A ver si lo adivinas».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi are quiet, and then... they start to giggle. The revolting sound makes your skin crawl.{/n} "Scary, isn't it? The thought that you're not the only mon-keigh who serves me. Try and guess, specimen. Try and guess."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los hemónculos se quedan callados, y entonces... se echan a reír. Es un sonido repulsivo que te pone la carne de gallina.{/n} «Da miedo, ¿verdad? La idea de que no seas {mf|el único|la única} mon-keigh a mi servicio. A ver si lo adivinas, espécimen. A ver si lo adivinas».
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone

languages.text: {n}Les hémoncules restent silencieux un instant, puis... se mettent à glousser. Le son qu'ils produisent est si répugnant que vous en frissonnez.{/n} « C'est effrayant, n'est-ce pas ? De savoir que vous n'êtes pas {mf|le seul|la seule} mon-keigh à mon service. Essayez de deviner, spécimen. Essayez donc. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi are quiet, and then... they start to giggle. The revolting sound makes your skin crawl.{/n} "Scary, isn't it? The thought that you're not the only mon-keigh who serves me. Try and guess, specimen. Try and guess."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les hémoncules restent silencieux un instant, puis... se mettent à ricaner. Le son qu'ils produisent est si répugnant que vous en frissonnez.{/n} « C'est effrayant, n'est-ce pas ? De savoir que vous n'êtes pas {mf|le seul|la seule} mon-keigh à mon service. Essayez de deviner, spécimen. Essayez donc. »
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone

languages.text: {n}黙っていたハモンキュラスが…クスクスと笑い出した。その不快な音があなたの肌をむずむずさせる。{/n}「怖いだろう？私に仕えるモン＝ケイはお前だけじゃないという考えが。当ててみろ、標本よ。試しに当ててみるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi are quiet, and then... they start to giggle. The revolting sound makes your skin crawl.{/n} "Scary, isn't it? The thought that you're not the only mon-keigh who serves me. Try and guess, specimen. Try and guess."

traits.locale_text: {n}黙っていたハモンキュラスが…クスクスと笑い出した。その不快な音があなたの肌をむずむずさせる。{/n}「怖いだろう？私に仕えるモン＝ケイはお前だけじゃないという考えが。当ててみろ、標本よ。試しに当ててみるのだ」
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone

languages.text: {n}Haimonkuluslar ses çıkarmıyor. Sonra birden... Kıkırdamaya başlıyorlar. Tiksindirici sesleri, tüylerini ürpertiyor.{/n} "Ne korkunç, değil mi? Bana hizmet eden tek mon-keigh'in sen olmadığı düşüncesi... Tahmin et bakalım numune. Hadi bir tahmin et."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi are quiet, and then... they start to giggle. The revolting sound makes your skin crawl.{/n} "Scary, isn't it? The thought that you're not the only mon-keigh who serves me. Try and guess, specimen. Try and guess."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkuluslar ses çıkarmıyor. Sonra birden... Kıkırdamaya başlıyorlar. Tiksindirici sesleri, tüylerini ürpertiyor.{/n} "Ne korkunç, değil mi? Bana hizmet eden tek mon-keigh'in sen olmadığı düşüncesi... Tahmin et bakalım numune. Hadi bir tahmin et."
